Gadgil also led a government panel studying the ecological impacts on the Western Ghats.

Her grounded perspective highlights the importance of respect and encouragement for teens discovering themselves.

title: Four students die in car crash after hitting tree post birthday party

Authorities are investigating if drunk driving was a contributing factor.

Buy Greenland? Take it? Why? An old pact already gives Trump a free hand
description: President Trump's desire to acquire Greenland for national security is complicated. A 1951 defense pact already grants the US extensive military access and base-building rights. Despite this, Trump's talk of buying the island faces strong opposition from Greenlanders and Denmark, who emphasize self-determination and the island's inalienable status.

title: Jabarkhet: can private reserves restore wildlife and keep tourism gentle?

Forever layoff: Ongoing small-scale cuts erode job security
description: Forever layoff captures a quiet shift in modern work: Layoffs that never end, only repeat. Through Dickens’s fact-driven Coketown and Kafka’s unfinished trial, this analysis traces how endless uncertainty reshapes mindspace, productivity, trust, and power at work. Jobs remain, but assurance disappears. Careers no longer progress or conclude. They linger, alert, provisional, and permanently under review.

description: Venezuelan leader Nicolas Maduro's courtroom invocation of God reveals a deep devotion to Indian guru Sri Sathya Sai Baba, revered as a "man of miracles." Maduro and other Venezuelan politicians were followers, with Sai Baba's portrait displayed in the presidential palace.  The guru's teachings of "love all, serve all" resonated widely, even amidst accusations of misconduct.

title: AGI feud intensifies: Here's what Sam Altman told Elon Musk about Google
description: Newly surfaced court documents reveal a 2023 exchange where Sam Altman called Elon Musk his hero, thanking him for OpenAI's founding while defending its mission. Despite acknowledging missteps, Altman insisted OpenAI prevented unilateral AGI control, a goal they both shared. Musk apologized for causing hurt but cited the "fate of civilization" as his justification.

title: Musk says he's impressed with China; highlights its rapid EV & solar growth
description: Elon Musk humorously noted China's rapid adoption of his energy ideas, from EVs and solar to massive battery production. He highlighted China's dominance in these sectors, contrasting it with US potential. Musk emphasized batteries, like Tesla's Megapacks, as crucial for doubling US energy throughput without new power plants, especially for AI's growing demands.

title: Travis Kelce reaches breaking point as Taylor Swift hits new career
description: As the Chiefs wrapped up a disappointing season, Travis Kelce faced mounting questions about his NFL future and the possibility of retirement. At the same time, Taylor Swift reached another career high, extending her historic run atop the Billboard 200. The contrast highlighted a pivotal moment for the high-profile couple, with one career pausing as the other surged forward.
